contentrichtext.text: {{Use dmy dates|date=May 2011}} {{Use Australian English|date=May 2011}} {{Orphan|date=February 2009}} {{Infobox Company | type = Subsidiary of [[Symantec]] | foundation = [[United States]] | location = [[United States]] | industry = [[Computer]]s | parent = [[Symantec]] }} '''XtreamLok''' was an [[information security]] company in [[Brisbane]], [[Australia]]. It was acquired by [[Symantec]] on 16 May 2005.<ref>{{cite web|accessdate=2008-04-15|url=http://www.itnews.com.au/News/18833,symantec-acquires-xtreamlok.aspx|title=Symantec acquires XtreamLok|publisher=iTnews|date=16 May 2005}}</ref> ==References== {{Reflist}} [[Category:Software companies of the United States]] [[Category:Companies based in Brisbane]] {{US-software-company-stub}}
